languages.text: Ключевая пассивная {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} авангарда {g|f:fc83a8ac57e54db59c3bb70083dc385c}Знак стойкости{/g} позволяет ему накапливать уровни одноименного эффекта, которые он получает за каждую атаку по себе. Каждый {g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}знак стойкости{/g} увеличивает {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}решимость{/g} авангарда на 1 до максимума 15. Союзники в радиусе двух клеток получают 1/5 от этого {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонуса{/g}. Кроме того, авангард может накапливать {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временное здоровье{/g} до начала своего следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}. Если оставшееся количество временного здоровья меньше количества знаков стойкости, оно становится равным количеству этих знаков, даже если в начале своего хода у авангарда не было временного здоровья. {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Героический акт{/g} авангарда позволяет ему до начала своего следующего хода атаковать врагов каждый раз, когда они нападают на союзников авангарда в радиусе 3 клеток от него. Авангард также отвечает атакой на каждую атаку до начала своего следующего хода. Важные {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристики{/g} авангарда: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближний Бой{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливость{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Общительность{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воля{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Сила{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Навыки{/g} авангарда: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Атлетика{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Устойчивость{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Убеждение{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Напор{/g}

The Vanguard's passive keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, {g|f:fc83a8ac57e54db59c3bb70083dc385c}Unyielding Beacon{/g}, lets them accumulate stacks of a unique {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} by the same name, which they gain whenever they are attacked. Each stack increases the Vanguard's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} by +1 up to a maximum of +15. Their allies within a 2-cell radius around them receive 1/5 of this {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}. The Vanguard can also gain {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} based on the number of stacks until the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. If a Vanguard has fewer remaining temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} than {g|f:fc83a8ac57e54db59c3bb70083dc385c}unyielding beacon{/g} stacks at the start of their turn, the number of temporary wounds becomes equal to the number of stacks even if the Vanguard had no temporary wounds at all at the start of their turn. The Vanguard's {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} allows them to attack enemies whenever they attack the Vanguard's allies within 3 cells of the Vanguard. The Vanguard likewise retaliates against anyone who attacks the Vanguard themselves. Both of these effects last until the start of the Vanguard's next turn. Key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skills{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletics{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Carouse{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coercion{/g}.
languages.original_text: Ключевая пассивная {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} авангарда позволяет ему накапливать {g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}знаки стойкости{/g}, которые он получает за каждую атаку по себе. Каждый знак увеличивает {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}решимость{/g} авангарда на 1 до максимума 15. Союзники в радиусе двух клеток получают 1/5 от этого {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонуса{/g}. Кроме того, авангард может накапливать {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временное здоровье{/g} до начала своего следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}. Если оставшееся количество временного здоровья меньше количества знаков стойкости, оно становится равным количеству этих знаков, даже если в начале своего хода у авангарда не было временного здоровья. {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Героический акт{/g} авангарда позволяет ему до начала своего следующего хода атаковать врагов каждый раз, когда они нападают на союзников авангарда в радиусе 3 клеток от него. Авангард также отвечает атакой на каждую атаку до начала своего следующего хода. Важные {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристики{/g} авангарда: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближний Бой{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливость{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Общительность{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воля{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Сила{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Навыки{/g} авангарда: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Атлетика{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Устойчивость{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Убеждение{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Напор{/g}

traits.locale_text: The Vanguard's passive keystone ability lets them accumulate stacks of unyielding beacon, which they gain whenever they are attacked. Each stack increases the Vanguard's resolve by +1 up to a maximum of +15. Their allies within a 2-cell radius around them receive 1/5 of this bonus. The Vanguard can also gain temporary wounds until the start of their next turn. If a Vanguard has fewer remaining temporary wounds than unyielding beacon stacks at the start of their turn, the number of temporary wounds becomes equal to the number of stacks even if the Vanguard had no temporary wounds at all at the start of their turn. The Vanguard's heroic act allows them to attack enemies whenever they attack the Vanguard's allies within 3 cells of the Vanguard. The Vanguard likewise retaliates against anyone who attacks the Vanguard themselves. Both of these effects last until the start of the Vanguard's next turn. Key characteristics: Weapon Skill, Toughness, Fellowship, Willpower, Strength. Skills: Athletics, Carouse, Persuasion, Coercion.

The Vanguard's passive keystone ability lets them accumulate stacks of unyielding beacon, which they gain whenever they are attacked. Each stack increases the Vanguard's resolve by +1 up to a maximum of +15. Their allies within a 2-cell radius around them receive 1/5 of this bonus. The Vanguard can also gain temporary wounds until the start of their next turn. If a Vanguard has fewer remaining temporary wounds than unyielding beacon stacks at the start of their turn, the number of temporary wounds becomes equal to the number of stacks even if the Vanguard had no temporary wounds at all at the start of their turn. The Vanguard's heroic act allows them to attack enemies whenever they attack the Vanguard's allies within 3 cells of the Vanguard. The Vanguard likewise retaliates against anyone who attacks the Vanguard themselves. Both of these effects last until the start of the Vanguard's next turn. Key characteristics: Weapon Skill, Toughness, Fellowship, Willpower, Strength. Skills: Athletics, Carouse, Persuasion, Coercion.

The Vanguard's passive keystone ability, Unyielding Beacon, lets them accumulate stacks of a unique effect by the same name, which they gain whenever they are attacked. Each stack increases the Vanguard's resolve by +1 up to a maximum of +15. Their allies within a 2-cell radius around them receive 1/5 of this bonus. The Vanguard can also gain temporary wounds based on the number of stacks until the start of their next turn. If a Vanguard has fewer remaining temporary wounds than unyielding beacon stacks at the start of their turn, the number of temporary wounds becomes equal to the number of stacks even if the Vanguard had no temporary wounds at all at the start of their turn. The Vanguard's heroic act allows them to attack enemies whenever they attack the Vanguard's allies within 3 cells of the Vanguard. The Vanguard likewise retaliates against anyone who attacks the Vanguard themselves. Both of these effects last until the start of the Vanguard's next turn. Key characteristics: Weapon Skill, Toughness, Fellowship, Willpower, Strength. Skills: Athletics, Carouse, Persuasion, Coercion.

The Vanguard's passive keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}Unyielding Beacon{/g}, lets them accumulate stacks of a unique {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} by the same name, which they gain whenever they are attacked. Each stack increases the Vanguard's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} by +1 up to a maximum of +15. Their allies within a 2-cell radius around them receive 1/5 of this {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}. The Vanguard can also gain {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} based on the number of stacks until the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. If a Vanguard has fewer remaining temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} than unyielding beacon stacks at the start of their turn, the number of temporary wounds becomes equal to the number of stacks even if the Vanguard had no temporary wounds at all at the start of their turn. The Vanguard's {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} allows them to attack enemies whenever they attack the Vanguard's allies within 3 cells of the Vanguard. The Vanguard likewise retaliates against anyone who attacks the Vanguard themselves. Both of these effects last until the start of the Vanguard's next turn. Key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skills{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletics{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Carouse{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coercion{/g}.

The Vanguard's passive keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}Unyielding Beacon{/g}, lets them accumulate stacks of a unique {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} by the same name, which they gain whenever they are attacked. Each stack increases the Vanguard's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} by +1 up to a maximum of +15. Their allies within a 2-cell radius around them receive 1/5 of this {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}. The Vanguard can also gain {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} based on the number of stacks until the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. If a Vanguard has fewer remaining temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} than unyielding beacon stacks at the start of their turn, the number of temporary wounds becomes equal to the number of stacks even if the Vanguard had no temporary wounds at all at the start of their turn. The Vanguard's {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} allows them to attack enemies whenever they attack the Vanguard's allies within 3 cells of the Vanguard. The Vanguard likewise retaliates against anyone who attacks the Vanguard themselves. Both of these effects last until the start of the Vanguard's next turn. Key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skills{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletics{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Carouse{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coercion{/g}.

languages.text: Die passive wesentliche {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} der Vorhut, {g|f:fc83a8ac57e54db59c3bb70083dc385c}Symbol der Unnachgiebigkeit{/g}, lässt sie Stapel eines einzigartigen {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}Effekts{/g} desselben Namens ansammeln, die sie erhält, wann immer sie angegriffen wird.. Jeder Stapel erhöht die {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Entschlossenheit{/g} der Vorhut um +1 bis zu meinem Maximum von +15. Ihre Verbündeten innerhalb eines 2-Zellen-Radius um sie herum erhalten 1/5 dieses {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g}. Die Vorhut kann außerdem bis zum Beginn ihres nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} temporäre {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} erhalten, basierend auf der Anzahl der Stapel. Hat eine Vorhut zu Beginn ihres Zugs weniger verbleibende {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporäre Wunden{/g} als Stapel von {g|f:fc83a8ac57e54db59c3bb70083dc385c}Symbol der Unnachgiebigkeit{/g}, gleicht sich die Anzahl temporärer Wunden der Anzahl der Stapel an, auch wenn die Vorhut zu Beginn ihres Zugs gar keine temporäre Wunden hatte. Die {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heldentat{/g} der Vorhut erlaubt ihr, Feinde anzugreifen, Wenn diese die Verbündeten der Vorhut innerhalb von 3 Zellen um die Vorhut angreifen. Die Vorhut übt gleichermaßen Vergeltung an jedem, der die Vorhut selbst angreift. Diese beiden Effekte dauern bis zum Beginn des nächsten Zugs der Vorhut an. {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Schlüsseleigenschaften{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfähigkeit{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Gefolgschaft{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Stärke{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Fertigkeiten{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletik{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Zechen{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Überredung{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Zwang{/g}.

The Vanguard likewise retaliates against anyone who attacks the Vanguard themselves. Both of these effects last until the start of the Vanguard's next turn. traits.locale_text: Die passive wesentliche {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} der Vorhut, {g|f:fc83a8ac57e54db59c3bb70083dc385c}Symbol der Unnachgiebigkeit{/g}, lässt sie Stapel eines einzigartigen {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}Effekts{/g} desselben Namens ansammeln, die sie erhält, wann immer sie angegriffen wird.. Jeder Stapel erhöht die {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Entschlossenheit{/g} der Vorhut um +1 bis zu meinem Maximum von +15. Ihre Verbündeten innerhalb eines 2-Zellen-Radius um sie herum erhalten 1/5 dieses {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g}. Die Vorhut kann außerdem bis zum Beginn ihres nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} temporäre {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} erhalten, basierend auf der Anzahl der Stapel. Hat eine Vorhut zu Beginn ihres Zugs weniger verbleibende {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporäre Wunden{/g} als Stapel von {g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}Symbol der Unnachgiebigkeit{/g}, gleicht sich die Anzahl temporärer Wunden der Anzahl der Stapel an, auch wenn die Vorhut zu Beginn ihres Zugs gar keine temporäre Wunden hatte. Die {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heldentat{/g} der Vorhut erlaubt ihr, Feinde anzugreifen, immer wenn diese die Verbündeten der Vorhut innerhalb von 3 Zellen um die Vorhut angreifen. Die Vorhut übt gleichermaßen Vergeltung an jedem, der die Vorhut selbst angreift. Diese beiden Effekte dauern bis zum Beginn des nächsten Zugs der Vorhut an. {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Schlüsseleigenschaften{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfertigkeit{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Gefolgschaft{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Stärke{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Fertigkeiten{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletik{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Zechen{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Überredung{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Zwang{/g}.

Die passive wesentliche {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} der Vorhut, {g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}Symbol der Unnachgiebigkeit{/g}, lässt sie Stapel eines einzigartigen {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}Effekts{/g} desselben Namens ansammeln, die sie erhält, wann immer sie angegriffen wird.. Jeder Stapel erhöht die {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Entschlossenheit{/g} der Vorhut um +1 bis zu meinem Maximum von +15. Ihre Verbündeten innerhalb eines 2-Zellen-Radius um sie herum erhalten 1/5 dieses {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g}. Die Vorhut kann außerdem bis zum Beginn ihres nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} temporäre {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} erhalten, basierend auf der Anzahl der Stapel. Hat eine Vorhut zu Beginn ihres Zugs weniger verbleibende {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporäre Wunden{/g} als Stapel von Symbol der Unnachgiebigkeit, gleicht sich die Anzahl temporärer Wunden der Anzahl der Stapel an, auch wenn die Vorhut zu Beginn ihres Zugs gar keine temporäre Wunden hatte. Die {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heldentat{/g} der Vorhut erlaubt ihr, Feinde anzugreifen, Wenn diese die Verbündeten der Vorhut innerhalb von 3 Zellen um die Vorhut angreifen. Die Vorhut übt gleichermaßen Vergeltung an jedem, der die Vorhut selbst angreift. Diese beiden Effekte dauern bis zum Beginn des nächsten Zugs der Vorhut an. {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Schlüsseleigenschaften{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfähigkeit{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Gefolgschaft{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Stärke{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Fertigkeiten{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletik{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Zechen{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Überredung{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Zwang{/g}.

languages.text: La {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} passive clé du patrouilleur, {g|f:fc83a8ac57e54db59c3bb70083dc385c}Guide inflexible{/g}, lui confère des cumuls de l'{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effet{/g} unique du même nom, dont il bénéficie chaque fois qu'il est attaqué. Chaque cumul augmente la {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}détermination{/g} du patrouilleur de +1 jusqu'à un maximum de +15. Tous les alliés présents dans un rayon de 2 cases autour de lui bénéficient d'un 1/5e de ce {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}. Le patrouilleur peut également bénéficier de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} temporaires en fonction du nombre de cumuls jusqu'au début de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant. Si au début du tour du patrouilleur, le nombre de {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}blessures temporaires{/g} restantes est inférieur au nombre de cumuls de {g|f:fc83a8ac57e54db59c3bb70083dc385c}Guide inflexible{/g}, il est alors égal au nombre de ces cumuls, même si le patrouilleur ne possède pas de blessures temporaires au début de son tour. L'{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acte héroïque{/g} du patrouilleur lui permet d'attaquer les ennemis chaque fois qu'ils attaquent ses alliés dans un rayon de 3 cases autour de lui. De même, le patrouilleur contre-attaque systématiquement. Ces effets durent jusqu'au début de son tour suivant. {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Caractéristiques{/g} clés : {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Capacité de combat{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sociabilité{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Force{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Compétences{/g} : {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athlétisme{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Résistance aux intoxications{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Intimidation{/g}.

The Vanguard's {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} allows them to attack enemies whenever they attack the Vanguard's allies within 3 cells of the Vanguard. The Vanguard likewise retaliates against anyone who attacks the Vanguard themselves. Both of these effects last until the start of the Vanguard's next turn. Key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skills{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletics{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Carouse{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coercion{/g}.

traits.locale_text: La {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} passive clé du patrouilleur, {g|f:fc83a8ac57e54db59c3bb70083dc385c}Guide inflexible{/g}, lui confère des cumuls de l'{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effet{/g} unique du même nom, dont il bénéficie chaque fois qu'il est attaqué. Chaque cumul augmente la {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}détermination{/g} du patrouilleur de +1 jusqu'à un maximum de +15. Tous les alliés présents dans un rayon de 2 cases autour de lui bénéficient d'un 1/5e de ce {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}. Le patrouilleur peut également bénéficier de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} temporaires en fonction du nombre de cumuls jusqu'au début de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant. Si au début du tour du patrouilleur, le nombre de {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}blessures temporaires{/g} restantes est inférieur au nombre de cumuls de {g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}Guide inflexible{/g}, il est alors égal au nombre de ces cumuls, même si le patrouilleur ne possède pas de blessures temporaires au début de son tour. L'{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acte héroïque{/g} du patrouilleur lui permet d'attaquer les ennemis chaque fois qu'ils attaquent ses alliés dans un rayon de 3 cases autour de lui. De même, le patrouilleur contre-attaque systématiquement. Ces effets durent jusqu'au début de son tour suivant. {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Caractéristiques{/g} clés : {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Capacité de combat{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sociabilité{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Force{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Compétences{/g} : {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athlétisme{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Résistance aux intoxications{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Intimidation{/g}.

La {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} passive clé du Patrouilleur, {g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}Guide Inflexible{/g}, lui confère des cumuls de l'{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effet{/g} unique du même nom, dont il bénéficie chaque fois qu'il est attaqué. Chaque cumul augmente la {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}détermination{/g} du Patrouilleur de +1 jusqu'à un maximum de +15. Tous les alliés présents dans un rayon de 2 cases autour de lui bénéficient d'un 1/5e de ce {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}. Le Patrouilleur peut également bénéficier de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} temporaires en fonction du nombre de cumuls jusqu'au début de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant. Si au début du tour du Patrouilleur, le nombre de {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}blessures temporaires{/g} restantes est inférieur au nombre de cumuls de Guide Inflexible, il est alors égal au nombre de ces cumuls, même si le Patrouilleur ne possède pas de blessures temporaires au début de son tour. L'{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acte héroïque{/g} du Patrouilleur lui permet d'attaquer les ennemis chaque fois qu'ils attaquent ses alliés dans un rayon de 3 cases autour de lui. De même, le Patrouilleur contre-attaque systématiquement. Ces effets durent jusqu'au début du tour suivant du Patrouilleur. {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Caractéristiques{/g} clés : {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Capacité de Combat{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sociabilité{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force Mentale{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Force{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Compétences{/g} : {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athlétisme{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Résistance aux intoxications{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Intimidation{/g}.

languages.text: 先锋的关键被动{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}：{g|f:fc83a8ac57e54db59c3bb70083dc385c}不灭明光{/g}，可以让先锋在遭到攻击时获得“不灭明光”{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}效果{/g}层数。 每层效果可以使先锋的{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}决心{/g}提高1点，最多提高15点。先锋周围2格内的盟友获得此{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}效果的1/5。 根据“不灭明光”层数，先锋还可以获得{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}临时生命值{/g}，效果持续至下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始为止。 当先锋的回合开始时，若先锋没有临时{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}，或临时生命值低于{g|f:fc83a8ac57e54db59c3bb70083dc385c}“不灭明光”{/g}层数，则立刻获得临时生命值，总值等同于“不灭明光”层数。 先锋发动{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄壮举{/g}之后，每当周围3格内的敌人攻击先锋的盟友时，先锋都会立刻攻击该名敌人。 此外，每当有任何敌人攻击先锋时，先锋都会进行反击。这两种效果都会持续至先锋的下个回合开始。 关键{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}：{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}。 {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}技能{/g}：{g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}运动{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}饮酒{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}劝说{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}胁迫{/g}。
languages.original_text: The Vanguard's passive keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, {g|f:fc83a8ac57e54db59c3bb70083dc385c}Unyielding Beacon{/g}, lets them accumulate stacks of a unique {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} by the same name, which they gain whenever they are attacked. Each stack increases the Vanguard's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} by +1 up to a maximum of +15. Their allies within a 2-cell radius around them receive 1/5 of this {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}. The Vanguard can also gain {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} based on the number of stacks until the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. If a Vanguard has fewer remaining temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} than {g|f:fc83a8ac57e54db59c3bb70083dc385c}unyielding beacon{/g} stacks at the start of their turn, the number of temporary wounds becomes equal to the number of stacks even if the Vanguard had no temporary wounds at all at the start of their turn. The Vanguard's {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} allows them to attack enemies whenever they attack the Vanguard's allies within 3 cells of the Vanguard. The Vanguard likewise retaliates against anyone who attacks the Vanguard themselves. Both of these effects last until the start of the Vanguard's next turn. Key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skills{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletics{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Carouse{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coercion{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 先锋的关键被动{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}：{g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}不灭明光{/g}，可以让先锋在遭到攻击时获得“不灭明光”{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}效果{/g}层数。 每层效果可以使先锋的{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}决心{/g}提高1点，最多提高15点。先锋周围2格内的盟友获得此{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}效果的1/5。 根据“不灭明光”层数，先锋还可以获得{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}临时生命值{/g}，效果持续至下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始为止。 当先锋的回合开始时，若先锋没有临时{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}，或临时生命值低于“不灭明光”层数，则立刻获得临时生命值，总值等同于“不灭明光”层数。 先锋发动{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄壮举{/g}之后，每当周围3格内的敌人攻击先锋的盟友时，先锋都会立刻攻击该名敌人。 此外，每当有任何敌人攻击先锋时，先锋都会进行反击。这两种效果都会持续至先锋的下个回合开始。 关键{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}：{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}。 {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}技能{/g}：{g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}运动{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}饮酒{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}劝说{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}胁迫{/g}。

languages.text: La {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} pasiva clave de los vanguardias, {g|f:fc83a8ac57e54db59c3bb70083dc385c}Dechado de firmeza{/g}, les concede acumulaciones del {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}efecto{/g} exclusivo del mismo nombre, que obtienen siempre que reciben algún ataque. Cada acumulación aumenta la {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}firmeza{/g} del vanguardia en cuestión en +1 hasta un máximo de +15. Los aliados que se hallen en un radio de 2 casillas recibirán 1/5 de esta {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g}. Los vanguardias también reciben {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} temporales en función del número de acumulaciones hasta que comience su siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}. Si un vanguardia tiene menos {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}heridas temporales{/g} que acumulaciones de {g|f:fc83a8ac57e54db59c3bb70083dc385c}Dechado de firmeza{/g} al comienzo de su turno, este número pasa a ser igual a dicha cantidad de acumulaciones incluso aunque el vanguardia no tenga heridas temporales al comienzo de su turno. El {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acto heroico{/g} de los vanguardias les permite atacar a los enemigos que dañen a los aliados que se ubiquen a 3 casillas del vanguardia en cuestión. De igual modo, este puede contraatacar a cualquiera que lo ataque primero. Ambos efectos duran hasta el comienzo del próximo turno del vanguardia. {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Características{/g} relevantes: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Empatía{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Fuerza{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Habilidades{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Atletismo{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Coacción{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasión{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coacción{/g}.
languages.original_text: The Vanguard's passive keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, {g|f:fc83a8ac57e54db59c3bb70083dc385c}Unyielding Beacon{/g}, lets them accumulate stacks of a unique {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} by the same name, which they gain whenever they are attacked. Each stack increases the Vanguard's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} by +1 up to a maximum of +15. Their allies within a 2-cell radius around them receive 1/5 of this {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}. The Vanguard can also gain {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} based on the number of stacks until the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. If a Vanguard has fewer remaining temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} than {g|f:fc83a8ac57e54db59c3bb70083dc385c}unyielding beacon{/g} stacks at the start of their turn, the number of temporary wounds becomes equal to the number of stacks even if the Vanguard had no temporary wounds at all at the start of their turn. The Vanguard's {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} allows them to attack enemies whenever they attack the Vanguard's allies within 3 cells of the Vanguard. The Vanguard likewise retaliates against anyone who attacks the Vanguard themselves. Both of these effects last until the start of the Vanguard's next turn. Key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skills{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletics{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Carouse{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coercion{/g}.

traits.locale_text: La {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} pasiva clave de los vanguardias, {g|f:fc83a8ac57e54db59c3bb70083dc385c}Dechado de firmeza{/g}, les concede acumulaciones del {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}efecto{/g} exclusivo del mismo nombre, que obtienen siempre que reciben algún ataque. Cada acumulación aumenta la {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}firmeza{/g} del vanguardia en cuestión en +1 hasta un máximo de +15. Los aliados que se hallen en un radio de 2 casillas recibirán 1/5 de esta {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g}. Los vanguardias también reciben {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} temporales en función del número de acumulaciones hasta que comience su siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}. Si un vanguardia tiene menos {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}heridas temporales{/g} que acumulaciones de {g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}Dechado de firmeza{/g} al comienzo de su turno, este número pasa a ser igual a dicha cantidad de acumulaciones incluso aunque el vanguardia no tenga heridas temporales al comienzo de su turno. El {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acto heroico{/g} de los vanguardias les permite atacar a los enemigos que dañen a los aliados que se ubiquen a 3 casillas del vanguardia en cuestión. De igual modo, este puede contraatacar a cualquiera que lo ataque primero. Ambos efectos duran hasta el comienzo del próximo turno del vanguardia. {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Características{/g} relevantes: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Empatía{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Fuerza{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Habilidades{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Atletismo{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Coacción{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasión{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coacción{/g}.

languages.original_text: The vanguard's key passive ability allows it to accumulate resilience tokens, which it gains for each attack on itself. Each token increases the vanguard's Resilience by 1 to a maximum of 15. Allies within a two-cell radius receive 1/5 of this bonus. In addition, the Vanguard can accumulate temporary health points until the start of its next turn. If the remaining number of temporary health points is less than the number of fortitude marks, it becomes equal to the number of those marks, even if the Vanguard had no temporary health points at the start of its turn. The Vanguard's Heroic Act allows it to attack enemies each time they attack Vanguard allies within 3 squares of it until the start of its next turn. The Vanguard also responds with an attack to each attack until the start of its next turn. Important Vanguard Traits: Close Combat, Stamina, Sociability, Willpower, Strength VanguardSkills: Athleticism, Resilience, Persuasion, Pressure

languages.text: ヴァンガードの重要なパッシブ{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}、{g|f:fc83a8ac57e54db59c3bb70083dc385c}不屈の標{/g}は攻撃を受けるたびに固有の{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}効果{/g}のスタックを獲得する。 1スタックごとに、ヴァンガードの{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}決断力{/g}が1増加する（最大+15）。周囲の半径2セル以内の味方はこの{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}の1/5を獲得する。 ヴァンガードは次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時までスタックの数に応じて{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}一時体力{/g}を獲得する。 ヴァンガードのターン開始時の一時{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}体力{/g}の残量が「{g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}不屈の標{/g}」のスタック数よりも少ない場合、そのスタック数と同じだけ一時体力を得る。これはターン開始時に一時体力がない場合でも同様の効果を発揮する。 ヴァンガードが{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄的行為{/g}を行使すると、ヴァンガードの周囲3セル以内の味方が攻撃を受けた場合には必ずヴァンガードが敵を攻撃できるようになる。 同様に、ヴァンガード自身が攻撃を受けた場合にも反撃が可能となる。これらいずれの効果も、ヴァンガードの次のターン開始まで持続する。 主要{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}特性{/g}：{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}近接攻撃{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}連帯{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}腕力{/g}。 {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}スキル{/g}：{g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}身体能力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}身体作用耐性{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}説得{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}強制力{/g}。
languages.original_text: The Vanguard's passive keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, {g|f:fc83a8ac57e54db59c3bb70083dc385c}Unyielding Beacon{/g}, lets them accumulate stacks of a unique {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} by the same name, which they gain whenever they are attacked. Each stack increases the Vanguard's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} by +1 up to a maximum of +15. Their allies within a 2-cell radius around them receive 1/5 of this {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}. The Vanguard can also gain {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} based on the number of stacks until the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. If a Vanguard has fewer remaining temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} than {g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}unyielding beacon{/g} stacks at the start of their turn, the number of temporary wounds becomes equal to the number of stacks even if the Vanguard had no temporary wounds at all at the start of their turn. The Vanguard's {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} allows them to attack enemies whenever they attack the Vanguard's allies within 3 cells of the Vanguard. The Vanguard likewise retaliates against anyone who attacks the Vanguard themselves. Both of these effects last until the start of the Vanguard's next turn. Key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skills{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletics{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Carouse{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coercion{/g}.

traits.locale_text: ヴァンガードの重要なパッシブ{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}不屈の標{/g}は攻撃を受けるたびに固有の{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}効果{/g}のスタックを獲得する。 1スタックごとに、ヴァンガードの{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}決断力{/g}が1増加する（最大+15）。周囲の半径2セル以内の味方はこの{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}の1/5を獲得する。 ヴァンガードは次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時までスタックの数に応じて{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}一時体力{/g}を獲得する。 ヴァンガードのターン開始時の一時{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}体力{/g}の残量が「不屈の標」のスタック数よりも少ない場合、そのスタック数と同じだけ一時体力を得る。これはターン開始時に一時体力がない場合でも同様の効果を発揮する。 ヴァンガードが{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄的行為{/g}を行使すると、ヴァンガードの周囲3セル以内の味方が攻撃を受けた場合には必ずヴァンガードが敵を攻撃できるようになる。 同様に、ヴァンガード自身が攻撃を受けた場合にも反撃が可能となる。これらいずれの効果も、ヴァンガードの次のターン開始まで持続する。 主要{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}特性{/g}：{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}近接攻撃{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}連帯{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}腕力{/g}。 {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}スキル{/g}：{g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}身体能力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}身体作用耐性{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}説得{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}強制力{/g}。

languages.text: The Vanguard's passive keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, {g|f:fc83a8ac57e54db59c3bb70083dc385c}Unyielding Beacon{/g}, lets them accumulate stacks of a unique {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} by the same name, which they gain whenever they are attacked. Each stack increases the Vanguard's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} by +1 up to a maximum of +15. Their allies within a 2-cell radius around them receive 1/5 of this {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}. The Vanguard can also gain {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} based on the number of stacks until the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. If a Vanguard has fewer remaining temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} than {g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}unyielding beacon{/g} stacks at the start of their turn, the number of temporary wounds becomes equal to the number of stacks even if the Vanguard had no temporary wounds at all at the start of their turn. The Vanguard's {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} allows them to attack enemies whenever they attack the Vanguard's allies within 3 cells of the Vanguard. The Vanguard likewise retaliates against anyone who attacks the Vanguard themselves. Both of these effects last until the start of the Vanguard's next turn. Key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skills{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletics{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Carouse{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coercion{/g}.

traits.locale_text: The Vanguard's passive keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, {g|f:fc83a8ac57e54db59c3bb70083dc385c}Unyielding Beacon{/g}, lets them accumulate stacks of a unique {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} by the same name, which they gain whenever they are attacked. Each stack increases the Vanguard's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} by +1 up to a maximum of +15. Their allies within a 2-cell radius around them receive 1/5 of this {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}. The Vanguard can also gain {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} based on the number of stacks until the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. If a Vanguard has fewer remaining temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} than {g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}unyielding beacon{/g} stacks at the start of their turn, the number of temporary wounds becomes equal to the number of stacks even if the Vanguard had no temporary wounds at all at the start of their turn. The Vanguard's {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} allows them to attack enemies whenever they attack the Vanguard's allies within 3 cells of the Vanguard. The Vanguard likewise retaliates against anyone who attacks the Vanguard themselves. Both of these effects last until the start of the Vanguard's next turn. Key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skills{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletics{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Carouse{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coercion{/g}.

languages.text: Öncü'nün pasif kilit {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyeti{/g} olan {g|f:fc83a8ac57e54db59c3bb70083dc385c}Yılmaz Fener{/g}, saldırıya uğradığından kazandığı aynı isimde eşsiz bir {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}etki{/g} biriktirmesine olanak tanır. Her bir birikim, Öncü'nün {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}kararlılık{/g} değerini 1 puan (maksimum 15) artırır. Çevresindeki 2 hücrelik yarıçap içindeki tüm dost birimler, bu {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonusun{/g} 1/5'ini kazanır. Ayrıca Öncü, birikim sayısına bağlı olarak {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}geçici sağlık{/g} puanı kazanır. Bu puanlar bir sonraki {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turun{/g} başlangıcına dek sürer. Öncü'nün turunun başında kalan geçici {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanı {g|f:fc83a8ac57e54db59c3bb70083dc385c}yılmaz fener{/g} birikiminden azsa, turu başladığında hiç geçici sağlık puanı olmasa bile, bu puanlar birikim sayısına eşitlenir. Öncü'nün {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}kahramanca eylemi{/g}, Öncü'nün kendisine en fazla 3 hücre uzakta olan dost birimlere saldıran düşmanlara saldırmasına olanak tanır. Öncü aynı şekilde kendisine yapılan saldırılara da misilleme yapar. Her iki etki de Öncü'nün bir sonraki turunun başlangıcında sona erer. Kilit {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}nitelikler{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Silah Yeteneği{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Dayanıklılık{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sosyallik{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Kuvvet{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Yetenekler{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Atletizm{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Tiryakilik{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}İkna{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Gözdağı{/g}.

Each stack increases the Vanguard's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} by +1 up to a maximum of +15. Their allies within a 2-cell radius around them receive 1/5 of this {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}. The Vanguard can also gain {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} based on the number of stacks until the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. If a Vanguard has fewer remaining temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} than {g|f:fc83a8ac57e54db59c3bb70083dc385c}unyielding beacon{/g} stacks at the start of their turn, the number of temporary wounds becomes equal to the number of stacks even if the Vanguard had no temporary wounds at all at the start of their turn. The Vanguard's {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} allows them to attack enemies whenever they attack the Vanguard's allies within 3 cells of the Vanguard. The Vanguard likewise retaliates against anyone who attacks the Vanguard themselves. Both of these effects last until the start of the Vanguard's next turn.
